def main():
    """
    The function main() is the main function of the program.
    """
    length = int(input())
    word_1 = input()
    word_2 = input()
    count = 0
    for i in range(length):
        if word_1[:i] + word_1[i+1:] == word_2[:i] + word_2[i+1:]:
            count += 1
    print(count)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
